list.name: Default
list.comment: Move common database routines out to sanskrit_data.

task.summary: Fixed bugs, everything except image book upload tested
Non-upload tests pass. Smarter target object creation.
Simplify API, automatically add text book upload functionality.
Fix potential conflicts in json schema
Language neutrality in type achieved and tested.
Add user database, oauth skeleton. Untested.
Basic oauth tested. Redirection working too.
Fix bug in saving user data in session.
Logout tested. Annotation addition and deletion protected.
Validate source user_ids while validating annotations.
Validate source user_id when validating annotations. Be able to log into textract. Safer deserialization from map.
Minor refactoring. Add couchdb module skeleton.
Ensure proper module loading before depickling.
Settle on mongo query language rather than js as an interface. Couchdb module updated, but needs to be fixed further.
Rename vedavaapi_data to sanskrit_data, separate it out into a separate project.
